Title: Celebrate the opening of the big bridge across the Yangzi
Designer: Pan Xingjian (潘行健)Hong Yaohua (洪耀华)Chen Shaofang (陈少芳)
Publisher: Changjiang wenyi chubanshe (长江文艺出版社)
Notes: A crowd admiring the recently opened bridge over the Yangzi river in Wuhan. Just left off center is a typical group representing three generations - grandmother, mother, child - or China's past, present and future.
Theme: The Yangzi River Bridge in Wuhan
